bruise.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a purple or brown mark on your skin that you get because you have fallen, been hit etc
bruise.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a mark on a piece of fruit that spoils its appearance
bruise.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if part of your body bruises, or if you bruise part of your body, it gets hit or hurt and a bruise appears
bruise.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: She fell off her bike and bruised her knee.
bruise.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to affect someone badly and make them feel less confident
bruise.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The incident had bruised his pride.
bruise.translation[1].definitions[2].def: if a piece of fruit bruises, or is bruised, it gets a bruise by being hit, dropped etc
